scripts.setup: npm install && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env.local')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env.local'); console.log('Created .env.local - Please add your OPENAI_API_KEY'); } else { console.log('.env.local already exists'); }"
scripts.deploy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('vercel.json')) { fs.unlinkSync('vercel.json'); console.log('Removed problematic vercel.json'); }" && vercel --prod
scripts.postinstall: echo Installation complete! Run npm run dev to start the development server
